title: Ticket #5759: DOCKER_DROP_ALL_CAPABILITIES should be an expression
description:
I guess I don't quite understand what Docker refer to as "capabilities", but it appears that the new default DOCKER_DROP_ALL_CAPABILITIES=true breaks Nebraska's images -- glexec stopped working for CMS.

We would prefer to only have setuid binaries function on site-whitelisted images, hence DOCKER_DROP_ALL_CAPABILITIES should be an expression that is evaluated in the context of the machine and job ads.
